var.name: studyno
var.labl: GESIS study number (EVS wave)
var.notes: GESIS Study Number: ZA3777

var.name: version
var.labl: GESIS archive version
var.notes:
GESIS Archive Version: 3.0.1 '2012-12-28'
This variable identifies the GESIS archive version number of this data set and the corresponding release date, recorded as an alphanumeric string. The version number is composed of a sequence of three numbers. The major number is incremented when there are changes in the composition of the data set (e.g. additional variables or cases), the minor or second number is incremented when significant errors have been fixed (e.g. coding errors, misleading value labels), and the third or revision number is incremented when minor bugs are fixed (e.g. spelling errors in variable or value labels).

var.name: id_cocas

var.notes: Unified respondent number Code comprises 12 digits: YYYY (year of wave), CCC (ISO-Code for country), and NNNNN (casenumber)

qstn.qstnLit: Of the areas mentioned, how much would you say you have contributed so far this year?

var.notes:
Question of 'Amount given' was included in the field questionnaire and seems to have been asked for C2-C9. Nevertheless, data for these items is not included in the final ZA3777 data set.
Please note also, in the questionnaire these are followed by Q83c, which asks whether the respondent contributes more, less or about the same amount of money as he/she did two years ago. This variable (Q83c) is not included in the final ZA3777 data set.

var.name: c29
var.labl: Compared with others, give...

qstn.qstnLit: There are many reasons why people can’t give to charity. Do you think that you give more, less or about the same to charity that other people in Britain?

qstn.qstnLit: Do you play the National Lottery frequently, sometimes or not at all?

var.name: c31
var.labl: Compared to two years ago, play lottery...

qstn.qstnLit: Compared to two years ago, would you say that you play the lottery more often, less, or about the same?

var.name: c32
var.labl: Involved in community life, compared with others

qstn.qstnLit: In your opinion, do you think you are more or less involved in community life and activities than other people?
